mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICE_SEQ, N.TITLE, N.NOTICE_YN, N.READ_CNT, N.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(N.REG_DT, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_DT FROM NOTICE N, USER_INFO U ORDER BY /*N.NOTICE_YN,*/ N.REG_DT DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_SEQ, TITLE, NOTICE_YN, CONTENTS, USER_ID, READ_CNT, REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT ) VALUES( (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(A.NOTICE_SEQ),0)+1 FROM NOTICE A), #{title}, #{noticeYn}, #{contents}, #{userId}, 0, #{userId}, NOW(), #{userId}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICE_SEQ, N.TITLE, N.NOTICE_YN, N.READ_CNT, CONTENTS, DATE_FORMAT(N.REG_DT, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_DT FROM NOTICE N WHERE N.NOTICE_SEQ = #{noticeSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET READ_CNT = READ_CNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{noticeSeq}
UPDATE NOTICE SET TITLE = #{title}, NOTICE_YN = #{noticeYn}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, CHG_ID = #{userId}, CHG_DT = NOW() WHERE NOTICE_SEQ = #{noticeSeq}
